title: Odyssey Contest: In Pursuit of Poetry

replies.body:
_Ora’s voice clutched tightly beside me_
**Heed my guidance, you arrogant fool**
_Whisper lies to slyly misguide me_
**Collect the ora, become my tool**

_As Emperor Kayn I’ll conquer skies_
**With Sona’s secrets, all will die**
_An eternal reign begins when I_
**Dark Star Rhaast emerges when I**

**_Take control_**

So cool to see this on the boards now. Great effort by Elam and Seras to get it here.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

With that said, I've composed a limerick to commemorate the occasion (and the passing of a beloved character).

> *The Morningstar's crew of misfits,
Recording their life in tidbits,
We saw Jinx who did throw,
Our beloved Helmet Bro,
And Yasuo, who hacked him to bits.*

Good luck to all!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

*Wanting to journey? then gather the crew,
However, a warning, they're worse than a zoo!
With tornadoes, hexmines and explosions galore,
There's nothing out there that you can't explore!
So go out and fight, though you'll die constantly,
Gather all of the ora, in the new odyssey!  *

_In timeless galaxies exists prized lifeblood Ora
But who’ll arrive first? Better believe the **Morning Star!**
Fierce recruits Ziggs, Jinx, Sona, Yasuo and Malphite
Fight against the Demaxian Empire’s dreadful might.
Our misfit crew must take down Ordinal Kayn to win.
So prepare your Augments, and let the onslaught begin!
_

_In the dark expanse of the night above,
Flies a vessel of pure gold,
A being of darkness chases those who defy,
That which the crew withhold._

_Help a Templar, and find peace, 
which may yet seem so far.
Join us: a captain, a pilot, a rock… 
Aboard the Morningstar!_

Here's a little something to remind everyone of the time they tried to complete Odyssey: Extraction on onslaught with just 2 Augments:

A Thrilling Adventure

Welcome crewmember!
Never fear a dull moment,
As more often than not,
Your crew member’s gone down!
They’ve been run down by Dozermaws,
Pulled into blazing volcanos,
Skewered by an oversize scythe.
But you get the idea.
Hurry up, revive that nerd!
Wait, where are you going?

Tinkerer of Piltover,
Will you breach prison once more?

Maven of strings,
Can you feel the rhythm of harmony tracing your blood? 

Desolate shard,
Do your duties guide you to Morningstar? 

Exiled swordsman,
Have you felt the surge of his tempest? 

Mad woman of Zaun, 
Shall you sate your vengeance?


(50 words?)

“What does the Ora tell you?”
Lifeblood of the stars.
Conduit of slingspace,
Bridge to the outer rim.
Fear, anguish. Hope, solace.
It screams of oblivion,
And weaps at creation.
Dark stars blaze in shdows
With singular purpose.
*“Kill. Them. ALL.”*
…
*“What does the Ora tell you, Sona?”*

Roses are red,
violets are blue,
Captain we're headed straight for sec two!

but here come monsters,
with tentacles in tens!
I've seen enough t.v to know how this ends! 

Perhaps at the time, we could have just hid,
But the option we chose was to run it down mid.

Wild winds sweep the map,
Ziggs goes boom and Jinx goes Zap!
Rocks, rockets and a flurry of blades
Falling, sighing as the music fades
Yet eternal laughter rings in your ears
And a hundred deaths brings you to tears.

There once was a king called Kayn,
Who loved destruction and pain,
Ora released in a squall,
Was blocked by Yasuo’s wall.
Hint: He rage quit the game.

Ummmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm.... No idea what I just wrote. Please give me the pity prize.

_Odyssey Sona searches
For the seeds of mankind
Which take root
And like thoughts,
Stay confined.
She sees the truth
However grim
And rallies her team behind.
Because like the others,
She does not shudder
To speak what's on her mind._

I wanted to try a new meaning for "speak" (because she's their seer) even though she's mute and will have a hard time relaying the information!

4 augs, 3 augs, 2 augs, all augs the pre-game is just as hard as Kayne.

Despite all odds, “all yasuo” is god, and we somehow make it through the pain. 

Cheers Rito for odyssey mode and the golden lizard looks great in lane!

You hate Yasuo?
One of them is too much huh?
Well now there's five.


:^)

The reaper is on the hunt
As malphite decides to grunt 
I’m really bad at rhyming
Perhaps kayn should have bought perfect timing
Yasuo screams hasaki
While Jinx screames whoopee
Ora pours out 
It’s a knockout!


ahaha this is so cringy but I want to try anyways pls don’t flame

Oh so cringy...

But it's good to give it a shot anyway.

_The crew is filled with misfits and freaks,
Fighting the onslaught for the next 3 weeks.
Evil is on the horizon with Kayne
If we don't return what is his we shall see his bane
But all of that it matters not
Because the new Sona skin is pretty hot_

Good Luck y'all. 
I really have no idea what i just did
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

Great initiative from the volunteers here and loving the idea of prizes for participation. I have put together a short limerick.

_The Shadow Kayne our champions must defeat,
So many monsters along the way to be swept off their feet.
This to be done before Yasuo attempts to feed,
But altogether with this game mode I am extremely pleased,
As new people and new friends you are bound to meet.
_

Best of luck to all!

{{sticker:vlad-salute}}

we fight across the plains

but they don't hear like I do
ora pleads, not just of kayn.
this world, unforgiving, unwelcoming.
but war's brought to it.
cheering as each pulse ripples its mined surface.

If only I could tell them

kayn isnt the only villain here.

-Sona

There once was a raid boss named Kayn
Our efforts to win were in vain
Because when Malphite ulted
Jinx got catapulted
And Yasuo needed a brain

_Logging on to join the search for Ora
Departing with the awesome Morningstar

Embracing the challenge of onslaught,
Laugh and taunt at monsters fought. 

Zap! I shoot the enemy!
This power, this madness! It’s getting to me!

Look! it’s Kayn! He’s so hot,
Ouch! The heck?! Got one shot… 

Defeat. _

--------------------------

I might as well try it out, what's the worst that can happen?

Rhaast is Red
Malphite is blue
I'm beating Odyssey Onslaught
With or without you

Dedicated to my friend who was left behind when we were grinding for the 2.75 mil club mission

The missions are fun and challenging, but you must stay alert,
as the insane onslaught missions do really hurt,
2 augs have made me tilt, perhaps rather bent,
however, Odyssey has been the greatest event.

New game mode, skin-line, lore and loot,
Riot keeps one up'ing themselves to boot.


P.S. Loving the mission rewards.{{sticker:sg-kiko}}

Five Yasuo mains entered the lobby.
'ggez' one shouted proudly.
All have locked in, no healer in sight.
The game has begun, let's fight!
Lacking support, an inevitable loss,
Lacking in teamwork, to face their final boss..
A waste of time, a game in vain..
Here comes, the mighty Kayn!

Here we go;

> _The somewhat sturdy Morningstar ship continues to traverse,
> Through mysterious and crazy adventures in the universe,
> Carrying the motley crew that is incredibly diverse,
> Bringing the pain and Onslaught to Kayn the Ordinal_

Odessey: Haiku 

2 augments or less 
Yasuo went 3 augments
Now teams AFK

{{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} 
_Quickly, the Morning star is on fire!
How in Demacia did this transpire?
Sona the sightseer said it was Ziggs
setting fire to the entire rig.
Yasuo was quick to react,
towards the flames he attacked.
"What are you doing!" We shout.
But with a gust, the flames went out._


*Made with the assistance of a friend.
Good luck to everyone else!

Welcome onboard summoner

Team up with a bunch of strangers

Pick a champion that you are prefer

Battle your way through “Cadet” and “Crewmember”

But when “Captain” and “Onslaught” takeover

Your life is in danger

It doesn’t mater if you got killed over and over

In the end you still be a winner.

On and on we fought in the Onslaught difficulty
The Team ensured the best use of their Augment tree
Yasuo and Malphite, a duo of destruction
Carved through the walls generated as an obstruction
Ziggs and Sona, the healers, managed to sustain
While Jinx swooned over their nemesis, Supervillain Kayn

Roses are red,
Everything in onslaught one shots me.
Kayn has 3 lives,
Please give me 1000 RP.

Thought of this little haiku when I read "The Lure".

An Emperor's lot,
To bring peace and to be damned,
'til the stars turn dark.

Adapted from the Meditations of Marcus Aurelius 7:36, "A king's lot; to do good and be damned."

This is the tale of a space wind man
He makes all his foes take a knee
If you dare disturb his reading
He'll tilt you 100 degrees ;)


Wind man enjoyed a good battle
He would strike with blinding speed
But he treated his battles like dinner time
because he would always feed.
{{champion:157}}  {{item:3070}}

The Odyssey rap by Yung Snorlax

hasayeet,
hasaskeet,
Yasuo finna feed,
Jinx has got the rock-ets,
that biddy finna rock it,
Malphite gonna ult it,
Yasuo gonna salt it,
and Ziggs is gonna yeet it,
5 yas?,
give me the gas,
Sona dont give me no sas.
:)

Is the Morningstar fueled and ready?
Great! We're off on a journey through the galaxy!
Jinx, Sona, Yasuo, Ziggs and Malphite
Hymns, hexplosives, windwalls, rockets & brutal strikes
We must defeat Kayn in all his darkin might!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

I don't usually write poetry so this was a bit of a challenge for me! I tried to write in iambic pentameter.

A gentle, weeping tune emanates from 
her etwahl as she floats over to the 
captain's lifeless body. Standing by him,
she hums a solemn tune of resuscitation.
He awakens, loudly gasping for air.
"From my mind to yours". Her voice is a sad
siren song from another universe.

This is actually the second version of the poem because I accidentally deleted my first one trying to format it... oops.

I did a short narrative piece (not really into rhymes)about shadow assassin Kayn wondering why the sacrifice of Sona made his heart so sad after they have defeated Rhaast.
As I sit in my throne all alone left to ponder if the price that was paid to rid the galaxy of that demon Rhaast was too much as I sink into my throne my heart hallow unable to understand why the death of one templar affected me so

Haze muck, gleaming lights piecing   
one step two
stumbles even tumbles
cyber punk blaring 
one beat two

Fall back to the chair 
loud screech as I dare 
one screech two
another shot to clear my mind

Screams high pitched
Demaxian guard??
one or two?
definitely more...
Accused?
What for?
No it couldn't be 
I defend myself 
one shot two

A friendly face comes to my aid
one no two
we must escape! 
we select our ship 
as we make our escape 

_**We ride the morning star! This is our crew!**_

Obscene monstrous beings, on an orbiting rock,
Damned and disastrous, many dangers ahead. 
Youths yearn for a fight, no intention to yield,
Some serious squads, others scriming for fun.
Spamming spells and slaying scum.
Extending the joy, earning hard-fought rewards,
Yet there is always, a need to grind some more.

_Sona is a creature of beyond
A templar, a human, eh... either one???
She can communicate with the ora
ORAther the LORA says "I know where the PlethORA are!"
For she has a fighting will
with minding grace fit for a Pentakill ... uwu_

Here you go! Take my tries into cries ;D

_Someone scary the crew must defeat,
Who thinks the Morning Star crew is obsolete
Little does he know,
He's up against
The toughest crew,
Jinx,Malphite,
Ziggs and Yas,
Dont forget the new one, Sona the lass!
They're here for 3 whole weeks,
So Go, get up on your feet!
_

_A ping in space, a signal of distress,
Look like we get to clean up another mess,
A capitalist miner trapped on the planet below,
No escape so we go with the Flow,
Tornadoes from all five, we smell our success._

_Welcome to the greatest crew in the galaxy
Its so much cooler than a space taxi
We’ve got our memelord captain yasuo
And space rock malphite duo!
our space wizard sona is kinda lame-o
ziggs appears as a cameo
But me, IM THE COOLEST
(awkward silence)
So, kid, whaddaya say?
_
